title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy states: "We work with third parties to provide some of our Services. For example, our Third-Party Providers send a verification code to your phone number when you register for our Services. These providers are bound by their Privacy Policies to safeguard that information. If you use other Third-Party Services like YouTube, Spotify, Giphy, etc. in connection with our Services, their Terms and Privacy Policies govern your use of those services."
